newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russia Jan-May trade surplus widens to $11 bln.
newsitem.headline: Russia Jan-May trade surplus widens to $11 bln.

text.p: Russia posted a trade surplus of $11.0 billion in the first five months of this year after a $6.8 billion surplus in the same period of 1996, the State Statistics Committee said on Tuesday.
Total trade, including other members of CIS:
RUSSIAN MERCHANDISE TRADE MAY 97 APR 97 MAY 96
Trade excluding other CIS members (trade with "far abroad"):
RUSSIAN MERCHANDISE TRADE MAY 97 APR 97 MAY 96
Notes -- Figures in billion dollars, FOB.
